benchmark_details.name: VSMRC (Vietnamese Text Segmentation and Multiple-Choice Reading Comprehension Dataset)
benchmark_details.overview: VSMRC is a comprehensive dataset that includes 15,942 documents for text segmentation and 16,347 synthetic multiple-choice question-answer pairs, specifically designed for Vietnamese natural language processing tasks.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a unified resource for Vietnamese text segmentation and multiple-choice reading comprehension tasks.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on precision and recall for text segmentation and correct choices for multiple-choice comprehension.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in segmenting texts and accurately answering comprehension questions.
methodology.baseline_results: mBERT achieved an accuracy of 88.01% on the MRC test set and an F1 score of 63.15% on the text segmentation test set.
